name: Wayward
description: You awake to discover yourself no longer in the company of good men or a fine seafaring vessel. Treasure... you remember something about treasure. Wayward is a challenging turn-based, top-down, wilderness survival roguelike. Explore, build, and most importantly survive in these unforgiving lands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz dual core or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with WebGL support, 512MB of video memory, and at least 128 GFLOPS. Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: View hardware compatibility issue list: <a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.waywardgame.com/compatibility" target="_blank" rel="noopener"  >http://www.waywardgame.com/compatibility
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with WebGL support, 1GB of video memory, and at least 512 GFLOPS.
